entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023
